name: Backrooms Cycle
description:
EVERY BACKROOMS CYCLE IS DIFFERENT


With procedurally generated levels, you'll never know what dangers and obstacles lay ahead. Will you be ready to face anything the backrooms throw at you?HELP OR NOT OTHER SCIENTISTS
Help out other members of the exploration group, or not. You have multiple choices in every questline (some are very questionable). Help upgrade the poolrooms outpost and unlock new levels.

FIGHT LEGENDARY BACKROOMS ENTITIES!


Complete the main questline, and fight legendary Backrooms entities. Get better, gear up, visit the trader and get the loot you need. If you try hard enough you may be the one to win your life back from the backrooms.


We have an ambitious plan to create an ultimate Backrooms experience so you can really immerse in Backrooms instead of just walking through it. Join us now and be a part of the development process of a great game, as we try to roll out updates as often as possible.
